"A.P.241/10/4 10:00": "I can't believe we would run into Luther like that..."
"It was so chaotic, beyond our imagination. You were right to label it a dream of the Akashic Record."
"Dreams are rather unreliable when it comes to things like that."
"Perhaps something crazier and absurd will happen now?"

"Alma... You're enjoying this
a little too much, aren't you?"
"Ah, sorry. I don't like this either, but I think we should do something about it."

"But it's just that this is the
first time, in a long time, that I
was able to talk to someone again.
It's been really enjoyable."
"Alma, didn't you say that you were with the Akashic Record?"
"What did you do after Xion had passed?"
"Nothing. I was just there, alone, with the Akashic Record."
"I was just there, alone, watching the universe's records as they were being archived. I thought everything was OK."
"But now that I'm talking to people again, I don't want to stop."
"Uhm, Alma... Would you like to talk to me when I have time?"
"Eh? But aren't you really busy, Xiera?"
"Don't worry, it's OK! Talking with others is part of my role here. Isn't that right, <%me>?"
"I see... Then let's talk whenever we can, Xiera!"
